seo: NPS,未授权漏洞,身份验证缺陷,后台利用
seo_en: NPS, unauthorized vulnerability, authentication flaw, backend exploitation
summary: 该插件针对NPS的未授权漏洞，通过伪造auth_key和timestamp参数，实现对后台功能的持续访问，解决手动复制粘贴的问题。
summary_en: This plugin targets the unauthorized vulnerability in NPS by forging auth_key and timestamp parameters to enable continuous access to backend functions, solving the issue of manual copy-pasting.
